body: Block glitching in Nexus no point but kinda fun. OCN bans players if they do this.
body_tagged: Block glitching in Nexus no point but kinda fun. OCN bans players if they do this.
title: Would you allow this?

replies.body: As long as it doesn't effect gameplay or give a significant tactical advantage, I'd say you can do it.
replies.body_tagged: As long as it doesn't effect gameplay or give a significant tactical advantage, I'd say you can do it.

replies.body: Really does nothing in Nexus just players can't kill you.
replies.body_tagged: Really does nothing in Nexus just players can't kill you.
